name: Flappy Bird (clone) (Rob Meade)
description:
Flappy Bird (clone)
This game is a recreation of the 2013 classic Flappy Bird by Dong Nguyen.

This game has been created solely for educational purposes. 

Permission was not given by the original author (Dong Nguyen) to recreate any part of the original game, or the use of the game's assets.  Many of the assets were sourced from GitHub, the remaining (missing) assets were created by myself using original gameplay recordings as reference.

Controls
Main menu - use the mouse to click the Play button
Get Ready - click with the mouse to continue
Flap - press the space bar

Note: 
As a clone of a mobile game, this version does not include an "exit" option.  To close the game press the Windows key, right-click on the taskbar icon for the game, choose Close Window.  Alternatively, you can choose End Task from the Window Task Manager.

The original version include buttons for rating the game and the leaderboard, as these are still present in the original, but no longer function, they do not function in this version.
